original_title: The Things That Make up my Body
overview: This Documentary film explores the idea of the Cosmos, the theory that the universe is a well-ordered whole. I have always believed in the interconnectedness of the world. This is the concept that this visual diary goes on to discover and express. This film invites the viewer to let go, and look at the world as if each peice is a kaleidoscope. It asks the viewer to look deeply and with intent and to realize that we all are a part of the system that keeps the universe working as a whole. This  film tries to narrate the life of the cosmos, as seen through the elements that make up my body.
title: The Things That Make up my Body
